snippet: Alan P. Gross, the American released from captivity in Cuba, and Scott Kelly, an astronaut scheduled to leave for a year aboard the International Space Station, will be among President Obama’s guests.
abstract: Alan P Gross, American released in December 2014 from five years of captivity in Cuba, and Scott Kelly, astronaut scheduled to leave for a year aboard the International Space Station, will be among Pres Obama’s guests at State of the Union address.
lead_paragraph: Alan P. Gross, the American released from captivity in Cuba, and Scott Kelly, an astronaut scheduled to leave for a year aboard the International Space Station, will be among President Obama’s guests.

headline.main: Obama Puts Cuba Captive on Guest List for State of Union Speech
headline.print_headline: Obama Puts Cuba Captive on Guest List for Speech
